item.title: Merlin add a quote by Randy Newman
item.description: "If I were to die tomorrow, I think they'd say Newman 56, composer of the hit song, Short People. Jumped off a mountain today." -- Randy Newman

item.title: Merlin add a quote by Dan Rather
item.description: "I had someone at the Houston police station shoot me with heroin so I could do a story about it. The experience was a special kind of hell. I came out understanding full well how one could be addicted to 'smack,' and quickly." -- Dan Rather

item.title: Merlin add a quote by Dan Rather
item.description: "I got addicted. News, particularly daily news, is more addictive than crack cocaine, more addictive than heroin, more addictive than cigarettes. " -- Dan Rather

item.title: Merlin add a quote by Dan Rather
item.description: "I've tried everything. I can say to you with confidence, I know a fair amount about LSD. I've never been a social user of any of these things, but my curiosity has carried me into a lot of interesting areas. " -- Dan Rather
